summary: Timer cancellation is not being properly cleaned up when a condition resolves, leading to unnecessary system load. The issue requests implementation of proper timer cancellation to reduce resource consumption.
userImpact: Users experience unnecessary resource consumption due to timers not being properly cancelled when conditions are met.
rootCause: Timer cancellation logic is not being invoked when a condition resolves, leaving timers active in the system.
proposedFix: Implement proper timer cancellation when conditions resolve to reduce system load.
keyQuote: It is better to cancel in order to reduce load on the system.
